resources.string:
Welcome to Padawan!

This application is a place for you to learn the common features of typical mobile bitcoin wallets.

It uses bitcoin's testnet, an alternative bitcoin network used globally and built exlusively for testing. The coins on this network do not have any value, but they otherwise look and behave just like normal bitcoins!

You should feel free to experiment, and not worry too much about making mistakes.
I already have a\nPadawan wallet\n(12-words backup)
I want to create\na new wallet
